T1.order_id , T1.flow_id , T1.cust_name , T1.cust_id , T1.supply_name , T1.supply_id , T1.cancel_result , T1.org_total , T1.freight , T1.order_total , T1.final_pay , T1.total_count , T1.order_status , T1.remark , T1.leave_message , T1.order_combined_id , T1.confirm_settlement , T1.settlement_money , T1.preferential_money , T1.preferential_remark , T1.pay_status , T1.pay_type_id , date_format(T1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , date_format(T1.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') pay_time , date_format(T1.cancel_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') cancel_time , date_format(T1.deliver_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') deliver_time , date_format(T1.receive_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') receive_time , date_format(T1.settlement_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') settlement_time , T1.create_user , date_format(T1.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time , T1.update_user , T1.bill_type , T1.Delay_log , T1.delay_times , T1.receive_Type , T1.payment_term_status , T1.payment_term , T1.pay_flag

o.order_id , o.flow_id , o.cust_name , o.cust_id , o.supply_name , o.supply_id , o.cancel_result , o.org_total , o.freight , o.order_total , o.final_pay , o.total_count , o.order_status , o.remark , o.leave_message , o.order_combined_id , o.confirm_settlement , o.settlement_money , o.preferential_money , o.preferential_remark , o.pay_status , o.pay_type_id , date_format(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , date_format(o.pay_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') pay_time , date_format(o.cancel_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') cancel_time , date_format(o.deliver_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') deliver_time , date_format(o.receive_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') receive_time , date_format(o.settlement_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') settlement_time , o.create_user , date_format(o.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') update_time , o.update_user , o.bill_type , o.Delay_log , o.delay_times , o.receive_Type , o.payment_term_status , o.payment_term , o.pay_flag
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM t_order WHERE 1=1

SELECT ,SYSDATE() AS NOWTIME,T4.PAY_TYPE,T4.PAY_TYPE_NAME FROM T_ORDER T1 LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE T4 ON T1.PAY_TYPE_ID = T4.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE T1.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND T1.FLOW_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{flowId},'%' )
AND T1.SUPPLY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplyName},'%' )
AND T4.PAY_TYPE=#{payType}
AND T1.CREATE_TIME >= #{createBeginTime}
AND T1.CREATE_TIME <= #{createEndTime}
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1' AND (T4.PAY_TYPE='1' OR T4.PAY_TYPE='3'))
AND FALSE
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '5'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND ((T1.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND (T4.PAY_TYPE='1' OR T4.PAY_TYPE='3')) OR (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1' AND T4.PAY_TYPE='2' ))
AND FALSE
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('6','12')
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '9'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '10'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('2','3','4','7')
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('8','11','14')
ORDER BY T1.ORDER_ID DESC

SELECT SUM(T1.ORG_TOTAL) FROM T_ORDER T1 LEFT JOIN T_SYSTEM_PAY_TYPE T4 ON T1.PAY_TYPE_ID = T4.PAY_TYPE_ID WHERE T1.CUST_ID = #{custId}
AND T1.FLOW_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{flowId},'%' )
AND T1.SUPPLY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplyName},'%' )
AND T4.PAY_TYPE=#{payType}
AND T1.CREATE_TIME >= #{createBeginTime}
AND T1.CREATE_TIME <= #{createEndTime}
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1' AND (T4.PAY_TYPE='1' OR T4.PAY_TYPE='3'))
AND FALSE
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '5'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1'
AND ((T1.ORDER_STATUS = '5' AND (T4.PAY_TYPE='1' OR T4.PAY_TYPE='3')) OR (T1.ORDER_STATUS = '1' AND T4.PAY_TYPE='2' ))
AND FALSE
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('6','12')
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '9'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS = '10'
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('2','3','4','7')
AND T1.ORDER_STATUS IN ('8','11','14')
AND T1.ORG_TOTAL IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: update t_order set order_status=4,cancel_time=sysdate(),cancel_result='系统自动取消' where (pay_type_id in(select pay_type_id from t_system_pay_type where pay_type=1) and order_status=1 and create_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -1 day)) or (pay_type_id in(select pay_type_id from t_system_pay_type where pay_type=3) and order_status=1 and create_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -7 day))
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_order WHERE (pay_type_id in(select pay_type_id from t_system_pay_type where pay_type=1) and order_status=1 and create_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -1 day)) or (pay_type_id in(select pay_type_id from t_system_pay_type where pay_type=3) and order_status=1 and create_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -7 day))

SELECT
FROM t_order WHERE order_status=5 or (order_status=1 and pay_type_id=2) and pay_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -7 day)

SELECT
FROM t_order WHERE order_status=6 and deliver_time < date_add(sysdate(), interval -7 day)

SELECT
FROM t_order o,t_order_combined c WHERE o.order_combined_id=c.order_combined_id AND c.pay_flow_id=#{payFlowId}
